insert into sys_company (com_name, upper_com_code, com_path, province, city, county, address, org_type, manager, phone, audit_status, valid_status, version, insert_time_for_his, operate_time_for_his, intro, profile_picture) values (#{comName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{upperComCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{comPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{county,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{manager,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{auditStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{validStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{insertTimeForHis,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{operateTimeForHis,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{intro,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{profilePicture,jdbcType=LONGVARBINARY})
mapper.update: update sys_company set com_name = #{comName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, upper_com_code = #{upperComCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, com_path = #{comPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, province = #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, city = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, county = #{county,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, org_type = #{orgType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, manager = #{manager,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, audit_status = #{auditStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, valid_status = #{validStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, version = #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER}, insert_time_for_his = #{insertTimeForHis,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, operate_time_for_his = #{operateTimeForHis,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, intro = #{intro,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, profile_picture = #{profilePicture,jdbcType=LONGVARBINARY} where com_code = #{comCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select com_code, com_name, upper_com_code, com_path, province, city, county, address, org_type, manager, phone, audit_status, valid_status, version, insert_time_for_his, operate_time_for_his, intro, profile_picture from sys_company where com_code = #{comCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
